scripts.dev:seed: cross-env ROOT_HASH=0x0 ROOT_VERSION=1 hardhat run scripts/seed-demo.js --network localhost
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n node,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:node" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8545 && npm run dev:contract && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.seed:debug: cross-env ROOT_HASH=0x82ed8e6e1fd21e3dd5413b80e81d2606ae07c16e3372a41468c76178478e1942 ROOT_VERSION=1 TARGET_DEPTH=5 DEBUG_SEED=1 hardhat run scripts/seed-demo.js --network confluxTestnet
scripts.seed:local: cross-env TARGET_DEPTH=5 hardhat run scripts/seed-demo.js --network localhost
scripts.circuits:fetch: bash -lc 'set -e; mkdir -p bin; curl -sSL -o bin/circom https://github.com/iden3/circom/releases/download/v2.1.6/circom-linux-amd64 && chmod +x bin/circom && bin/circom --version'
scripts.circuits:build: bash -lc 'set -e; mkdir -p artifacts/circuits && ./bin/circom circuits/person_hash_zk.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -l node_modules -l node_modules/circomlib/circuits -l node_modules/keccak256-circom/circuits -l node_modules/keccak256-circom/circuit -o artifacts/circuits'
scripts.circuits:ptau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 19 tmp/pot19_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute tmp/pot19_0000.ptau tmp/pot19_0001.ptau --name="init" -v -e="entropy1" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 tmp/pot19_0001.ptau tmp/pot19_final.ptau -v
scripts.circuits:setup: snarkjs groth16 setup artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk.r1cs tmp/pot19_final.ptau artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_0000.zkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey --name="1st" -v -e="entropy2" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk.vkey.json
scripts.circuits:export: snarkjs wtns export json circuits/test/witness.wtns circuits/test/public.json
scripts.circuits:prove: snarkjs groth16 fullprove circuits/test/fullname_hash_input.json artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_js/person_hash_zk.wasm artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey tmp/proof.json tmp/public.json
scripts.circuits:full-test: npm run circuits:build && npm run circuits:test && npm run circuits:witness && npm run circuits:export
